name: Your Little Cute Tree
description:
A game made for My First Game Jam Summer 07/2020.
The theme was Change. 

 In Your Little Cute Tree you have to change the weather to grow your small plant and turn it into a tree!

The game is pretty easy and short.

I wanted to implement more features like the season environment change but it's hard to do a lot of things with a full-time job.

Hope you enjoy, feel free to say what you think about the game in the comment section!
